result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn J Emshoff was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Court orders bond on file to be applied. Costs are paid in full.

The defendant must maintain absolute sobriety, may not be present upon the premises of any bars, and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician.
Defendant is to comply with any rules/recommendations as deemed appropriate by the supervising agent.   DNA surcharge assessed-sample previously provided.
Defendant to undergo an alcohol and other drug assessment and comply with any further counseling and/or treatment as deemed appropriate by the supervising agent.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: JOC returned by USPS - Not deliverable as addressed - Unable to Forward
by USPS - Not deliverable as addressed - Unable to Forward

11:17 am case called. Defendant Shawn J Emshoff in court with attorney Michael Ross Blum.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Agreement stated on record by ADA Anderson. Court questions defendant regarding resolution and appearance by phone. Defendant waives right to be personally present. Court accepts waiver of personal appearance.   Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea QN reviewed w/Defendant.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed.  Plea: No Contest to Count 1 & Count 3. Court accepts plea and enters JOC. Court dismisses and reads in Counts 2 & 4. Court sentences the defendant to: SWD and places on probation for a period of 20 months. CONDITIONS: AODA and follow through,   The defendant must maintain absolute sobriety, may not be present upon the premises of any bars, and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician. Costs to be paid within 60 days or payment plan. Bond on file to be applied. Court questions defendant regarding DNA sample-previously provided. Appeal rights provided to Attorney Blum.

NOT PUT OF RECORD: Attorney Michael Ross Blum in court appears telephonically.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Blum requesting a plea/sentencing hearing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 15, 2015 at 11:15 am.

The defendant must maintain absolute sobriety, may not be present upon the premises of any bars, and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician.

ADDRESS INFO for Shawn J Emshoff
Current: 3001 Green Meadow Dr; Apt 4, Appleton, WI 54914   (Effective: 07-28-2015)
Prior: 3053 Green Meadow Dr; Apt 4, Appleton, WI 54914

Case Recalled @ 2:20 PM: Defendant Shawn J Emshoff in court, appearing via telephone with attorney Michael Ross Blum, appearing in person.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.    NGP received and entered.   Court will continue $2200 cash bond w/conditions.  STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Status conference scheduled for September 1, 2015 at 01:50 pm.

Case Called @ 2:08 PM: Attorney Michael Ross Blum in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Def does not call in.  In light of nonappearance, Court authorizes Arrest Warrant, with Statewide Extradition.  Bond ordered forfeited.  Atty Blum requests stay of warrant for a few days to allow for appearance.  Court declines to stay Arrest Warrant any further.  Also review of CCAP notes other matters are not being addressed in other jurisdictions.  Court respectfully orders bond forfeited of $2200.00.
